process.name: Encapsulate Digital Object and its Metadata
process.description: Atomic process that encapsulate a digital object and its metadata together in a package of a specific format

inputs.name: Digital Material InputSlot
inputs.description: Input slot corresponding to the digital object

inputs.name: Metadata InputSlot
inputs.description: Input slot corresponding to the metadata

inputs.name: Package Format InputSlot
inputs.description: Input slot corresponding to the package format used to encapsulate the digital object and its metadata

outputs.name: Output Package
outputs.description: Output slot corresponding to the package resulting of encapsulate a digital object and its metadata
